settings.paragraph:
Nora comes with a one-year limited warranty, from the time of receiving it, which protects you against manufacturing defects. There is also a 30-day satisfaction guarantee, so that if you are not satisfied with your purchase, you can return Nora in its original condition to receive a full refund. The 30-day satisfaction guarantee starts from delivery date.

If you are within the limited warranty, you have an option to extend the warranty for an additional 1-3 years. To learn more about our policy, please read the details below.

* The 30 day risk-free trial is only available for online purchases. Purchases at re-sellers or distributors may or may not offer this 30 day risk free trial.
